definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Tuo1 ma3 si1 · Si4 te4 en1 si1 · Ai4 lu:e4 te4
containing_words.word: 托马斯·斯特恩斯·艾略特

sentences.english: We've also had people want to tell Stern about this unfair treatment.
sentences.chinese: 也有些童子想把这个不公平的待遇告诉斯特恩。

sentences.english: He went looking for Sterner to give him the good news.
sentences.chinese: 他去找斯特恩列兵，告诉他这个好消息。

sentences.english: "We want to play basketball," NBA commissioner David Stern said.
sentences.chinese: “我们想要去打球，”NBA总裁大卫斯特恩说。

sentences.english: It is, after all, Stern's job to speak for the owners during a conflict.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩在冲突中为球队老板代言毕竟是他应尽的本份。

sentences.english: Marnie Stern came to music relatively late in her life.
sentences.chinese: 马妮斯特恩来到了她生活中的音乐比较晚。

sentences.english: I would tell Stern or Alexander that they will be spending that money in the commissary in Hell.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到斯特恩或亚力山大会在联盟中烂花这笔钱。

sentences.english: But Stern's tough-guy routine five years ago applies well.
sentences.chinese: 然而斯特恩五年前的强硬路线如今仍然管用。

sentences.english: Stern played down prospects of reaching a deal this week.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩认为本周达成该项协议的可能性不高。

sentences.english: There won't be any Arizona Cardinal-type run to ruin Stern's party.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩不允许再有红衣主教那样的人搅乱他的派对。

sentences.english: The major hold-up, said Stern, is the large costs involved.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩表示，巨额成本是载人航天的主要障碍。

sentences.english: How to turn the Stern Review into action?!
sentences.chinese: 如何将斯特恩的观点转变成行动？

sentences.english: DOUG JOHNSON: Marnie Stern makes music that is energetic, experimental and creative.
sentences.chinese: 马妮斯特恩使得音乐是精力充沛，实验性和创造性。

sentences.english: “It did them a giant disservice, ” said Dr. Stein of the geological survey.
sentences.chinese: “这帮了一个大倒忙，”地质局的斯特恩博士说。

sentences.english: Marnie Stern has said that she only likes to listen to music in which risks are being taken.
sentences.chinese: 马妮斯特恩说，她只喜欢听音乐正在采取哪些风险。

sentences.english: "We want to play basketball, " NBA commissioner David Stern said.
sentences.chinese: “我们想要去打球，”NBA总裁大卫斯特恩说。

sentences.english: Her most recent album is called "Marnie Stern."
sentences.chinese: 她的最新专辑叫做“马妮斯特恩。”

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
